mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Community(commuCtgNo,commuTitle, memNick, commuInfo,commuPhoto, commuDate ,commuLike, commuHate, commuView, commuComNum) VALUES ('${commuCtgNo}', '${commuTitle}', '${memNick}', '${commuInfo}','${commuPhoto}',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,0,0,0,0)
INSERT into Commu_Like(memNick, commuNo, commuLikeN) SELECT '${memNick}', ${commuNo},0 FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM Commu_Like WHERE memNick='${memNick}' AND commuNo=${commuNo})
mapper.select: SELECT commuLikeN FROM Commu_Like WHERE memNick = '${memNick}' AND commuNO = ${commuNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE Community AS a, Commu_Like AS b SET a.commuLike = a.commuLike+1, b.commuLikeN= 1 WHERE a.commuNo =${commuNo} AND b.memNick = '${memNick}' AND b.commuLikeN = 0
